description.value:
Source Villain Codex pg. 57

Statistics

Cost 2,000 gp Weight 12 lbs.

Damage 1d10 (small), 1d12 (medium); Critical x3; Range 60 ft.; Type B and P; Special -

Misfire 1-2 (5 ft.); Capacity 3

Category Two-Handed; Proficiency Exotic

Description

This long-barreled musket shoots more precisely than other muskets but is slightly less damaging on a critical hit. It can fire only dragoon cartridges or specially modified mage shot.
